ygData.subject: Silly
ygData.msgSnippet: The fact that someone is selling spyglasses is completely irrelevent. It is quite possible that the spyglass is a rare drop item, or loads on some unknown mob.
ygData.messageBody:
The fact that someone is selling spyglasses is completely irrelevent. It is
quite possible that the spyglass is a rare drop item, or loads on some
unknown mob. I have not seen a shred of proof that anyone has ever tinkered
a collapsible fishing pole. Try to get this Salvador guy or whatever his
name is to sell you a fishing pole.

Unfortunately, this is irrelevent too, because the fishing pole could be
loading on some unknown mob as well, or be part of a quest, or whatever.

What kind of numbers are we talking about with this guy selling spyglasses?
Does he actually sell them? I doubt he tells anyone how many he has, and it
is possible he only has one that he keeps trying to sell.
